name: XYZ University
about: XYZ University is a premier institution offering world-class education in various fields of study, fostering research and innovation.

admission.process: Online application followed by an entrance exam and interview.
admission.eligibility: Must have completed high school with at least 50% marks.
admission.importantDates: Applications open on 1st June and close on 31st July. Entrance exam on 15th August.

academics.facultyInfo: Experienced faculty members with PhDs and industry expertise.

facilities.library: State-of-the-art library with over 100,000 books and journals.
facilities.sports: Football, basketball, cricket grounds, and indoor facilities.
facilities.hostels: Separate hostels for boys and girls with 24/7 security and Wi-Fi.
facilities.labs: Well-equipped labs for engineering and science students.
facilities.infrastructure: Modern campus with Wi-Fi, seminar halls, and recreational areas.

events.cultural: Annual cultural fest with music, dance, and drama performances.
events.technical: Technical fest featuring workshops, competitions, and hackathons.
events.sportsFest: Inter-college sports events held every year.

placement.statistics: 85% placement rate with top companies visiting campus.

faq.question: What is the admission process?
faq.answer: The admission process includes an online application, entrance exam, and interview.

faq.question: Are there any scholarships available?
faq.answer: Yes, the university offers merit-based scholarships.

accreditation.ranking: Ranked 15th among top engineering colleges in the country.
